title: How to track my vehicle which has GPS - Quora

response.answer_text: If this has to be done in a legally acceptable way, then commercially systems are available. If otherwise, a smartphone with charging or battery back-up can be used running Google maps to “find” that phone from a laptop or another device

Your car needs to be installed with GPS Tracking Device with which you can keep track of your vehicles on your phone. TrakingPro comes with GPS Tracking Devices named TPro 03 Vehicle Tracker with which you can keep track of your vehicles. For more Details:- www.trakingpro.com
